vclaim: After rapper DMX’s death in April 2021, music power couple Jay-Z and Beyonce bought the rapper’s original song recordings, known as “masters,” for $10 million in order to give all proceeds to his 17 children.
title: Did Jay-Z and Beyonce Buy DMX’s Masters to Benefit His 17 Kids?
subtitle: The sale was rumored to cost $10 million.
author: Madison Dapcevich
